qa_list.question: What is the main topic of the text?
qa_list.answer: The main topic of the text is softball.

qa_list.question: When was the Eleven Earn NFCA All-America Scholar Honors announced?
qa_list.answer: The Eleven Earn NFCA All-America Scholar Honors were announced on July 21, 2023.

qa_list.question: When was the Softball Staff Announces Annual Fall Prospect Camp?
qa_list.answer: The Softball Staff Announced the annual fall prospect camp on January 16, 2024.

qa_list.question: What event did the Tartans impress in during the fall semester of 2023?
qa_list.answer: During the fall semester of 2023, the Tartans impressed once again in their classroom.

qa_list.question: When was the Department Honors Top Academic Athletes at Annual Celebration held?
qa_list.answer: The annual celebration to honor top academic athletes was held on December 14, 2023.

qa_list.question: How many Tartans earned UAA Presidents Council Scholar-Athlete Recognition in August 2023?
qa_list.answer: Fifteen Tartans earned the UAA Presidents Council Scholar-Athlete Recognition in August 2023.

qa_list.question: What is the date of the Eleven Earn NFCA All-America Scholar Honors?
qa_list.answer: The Eleven Earn NFCA All-America Scholar Honors were announced on July 21, 2023.

qa_list.question: What is the date of the Softball Staff Announces Annual Fall Prospect Camp?
qa_list.answer: The annual fall prospect camp was announced on January 16, 2024.

qa_list.question: When were the Tartans impressive in their classroom during the fall semester of 2023?
qa_list.answer: During the fall semester of 2023, the Tartans impressed once again in their classroom.

qa_list.question: When was the Department Honors Top Academic Athletes at Annual Celebration held?
qa_list.answer: The annual celebration to honor top academic athletes was held on December 14, 2023.

qa_list.question: What is the date of the softball game?
Who won the softball game between NYU and Carnegie Mellon on Apr/02?
What was the final score of the softball game between Wooster and Carnegie Mellon on Tue, Apr/04?
qa_list.answer: Wooster won with a score of 10-0

qa_list.question: How many innings did the softball game between Washington (Mo.) and Carnegie Mellon last on Fri, Apr/07?
qa_list.answer: The game was finalized after 10 innings.

qa_list.question: Who won the softball game between Case Western Reserve and Carnegie Mellon on Fri, Apr/14?
What was the final score of the softball game between #7 Case Western Reserve and Carnegie Mellon on Sat, Apr/08?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon won with a score of 2-1

qa_list.question: Who won the softball game between Emory and Carnegie Mellon on Fri, Apr/21?
What was the final score of the softball game between Emory and Carnegie Mellon on Sun, Apr/23?
qa_list.answer: Carnegie Mellon won with a score of 18-0

qa_list.question: How many innings did the softball game between Emory and Carnegie Mellon on Fri, Apr/21 last?
qa_list.answer: The game was finalized after 5 innings.
